work.summary: Seasonal intern with the business intelligence department for the 2019-20 season
highlights: Created automatic data pipeline from the new Phoenix Suns Mobile Wallet (via Braintree API) into our data warehouse
Created automatic data pipeline to Stubhub API using Python & SAS to evaluate the Suns resell market as well as ensure ticket holders were complying with their policies on reselling tickets
Used SQL to transform and manipulate data then create dashboards in Spotfire that were updated automatically
Built out predictive models for total attendance and merchandise budgeting to prep for the season

highlights: Created automated data pipeline of fan experience surveys into the clubâ€™s data warehouse as a new data source containing 500k+ responses using SurveyMonkey API and Python
Prospect identification in database with over 70k fans using SAS Enterprise Guide
Designed executive level reports and tables for potential jersey sponsors that met specific KPIs
Assisted corporate partnership team by developing reports for potential sponsors

work.summary: Applied research project commissioned by a Major English Premier League Club
highlights: Coded in-game events and behaviors for over 2,000 videos
1 of only 5 people out of 20 coders to be promoted from part time to a full-time position
